Control Name: Incorporate multi-factor authentication for all remote network access (both user and administrator, and including third-party access for support or maintenance) originating from outside the entity\u2019s network.

control_attributes.Control: Incorporate multi-factor authentication for all remote network access (both user and administrator, and including third-party access for support or maintenance) originating from outside the entity\u2019s network.
control_attributes.Requirement: 8.3.2.Identify and authenticate access to system components
